name: RumBoy
description:
RumBoy

Click on the game, then use arrow keys, Z and X.

"Ooh, I've got a right thirst on!" Development

A linear short story game,  built entirely by myself with GB Studio in a couple weeks, and is completely open source!

An intense challenge. GB graphics palettes are an absolute nightmare that I might never repeat. But, the main theme is an Alestorm cover which turned out great and I had an awesome time making it!

Contact
